alert.note: Alert for Barnes; Benson; Cavalier; Eddy; Griggs; Nelson; Ramsey; Steele; Towner; Walsh (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 04 at 10:58PM CDT until September 04 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Benson County in northeastern North Dakota... Towner County in northeastern North Dakota... Southwestern Cavalier County in northeastern North Dakota... Nelson County in northeastern North Dakota... Griggs County in southeastern North Dakota... Ramsey County in northeastern North Dakota... Northwestern Barnes County in southeastern North Dakota... Western Walsh County in northeastern North Dakota... Eddy County in northeastern North Dakota... Northwestern Steele County in southeastern North Dakota... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1058 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Esmond to 7 miles northeast of Devils Lake to near Wimbledon, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Devils Lake, New Rockford, Cando, Cooperstown, Camp Grafton, Lakota and Lakewood Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Barnes; Benson; Cavalier; Eddy; Griggs; Nelson; Ramsey; Steele; Towner; Walsh
